Class FilterChain<P>

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.types.FilterChain,P>
          mkr.ant.types.FilterChain<P>

public class FilterChain<P>
extends AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.types.FilterChain,P>

FilterChain may contain a chained set of filter readers.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.FilterChain)

setRefid

public FilterChain<P> setRefid(org.apache.tools.ant.types.Reference val)
Makes this instance in effect a reference to another FilterChain instance.

You must not set another attribute or nest elements inside this element if you make it a reference.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.FilterChain.setRefid)
